volunteers.title: Be a volunteer at Agile Brazil!

pages-strings.In 2019 our conference will be held in B: In 2019 our conference will be held in Belo Horizonte!
pages-strings.We invite the agile community to sow val: We invite the agile community to sow values ​​and agile principles and together reap the fruits of our culture.
pages-strings.100 registrations or until April 15th, w: 100 registrations or until April 15th, whichever comes first
pages-strings.100 registrations or until May 15th, whi: 100 registrations or until May 15th, whichever comes first
pages-strings.100 registrations or until June 15th, wh: 100 registrations or until June 15th, whichever comes first
pages-strings.100 registrations or until July 15th, wh: 100 registrations or until July 15th, whichever comes first
pages-strings.*Paulo Caroli has more than 20 years of: *Paulo Caroli has more than 20 years of experience with software development, working at various corporations from Brazil, India, USA and other across Latino America. In 2000, he discovery the Extreme Programming and, since then, focused his experience on Agile & Lean processes and practices. He joined ThoughtWorks at 2006 and worked as Agile Coach, Trainer, Project and Delivery Manager. He has a bachelor's degree in Computing and master in Software Engineering, both at PUC-Rio. Caroli is passionate about innovation, entrepreneurship and digital products. He is software engineer, writer, speaker and an exepctional facilitator.*
pages-strings.*Holding a master’s degree in Strategic: *Holding a master’s degree in Strategic Design, Carla believes in the collaborative potential of people to turn cities into better and more sustainable places. For 6 years, she has developed social innovation projects based on design, working on strategies, platforms and services to improve urban systems and quality of life in cities. As an example, in one of her projects, she traveled around 9 cities in the Brazilian semi-arid region, co-creating new futures for and with the local youths. Her company, Talking City, focuses on improving public services based on collaboration with citizens, with one of the main initiatives being the Safe City Movement - a safety innovation laboratory for the City of Porto Alegre. She is a member of the Ocupe & Abrace(Occupy and Hug) Collective (who works in the cultural and environmental occupation of “Praça da Nascente” city park in São Paulo) and she is a Professor in undergraduate and graduate programs at IED-SP and in the MBA Branding Innovation of Faculdades Rio Branco.*
pages-strings.**Obtenha descontos de até 20% na compra: **Obtenha descontos de até 20% na compra de passagens para a AGILE BRAZIL com a LATAM AIRLINES.**
pages-strings.Acesse o site www.latam.com e insira o *: Acesse o site www.latam.com e insira o **Código Promocional** `E0EPR`.
pages-strings.* Condição válida e exclusiva aos partic: * Condição válida e exclusiva aos participantes do evento;
pages-strings.* Valores sujeitos à disponibilidade de: * Valores sujeitos à disponibilidade de assentos e regras/restrições específicas de cada tarifa;
pages-strings.* Válidos para embarque de 09/09 a 16/09: * Válidos para embarque de 09/09 a 16/09/19 no trecho Brasil/Confins/Brasil;
pages-strings.* Sem descontos sobre tarifas promociona: * Sem descontos sobre tarifas promocionais específicas;
pages-strings.* Em casos de ida ou retorno fora do per: * Em casos de ida ou retorno fora do período negociado, o desconto não se aplica;
pages-strings.* Desconto não válido para tarifas de Me: * Desconto não válido para tarifas de Mega Promo;
pages-strings.* Desconto não válido para menores de 12: * Desconto não válido para menores de 12 anos;
pages-strings.* Desconto válido para rotas operadas pe: * Desconto válido para rotas operadas pela LATAM.
pages-strings.Acesse o hotsite http://parceiros.unidas: Acesse o hotsite http://parceiros.unidas.com.br/ppu_unidas/servlet/hhome?WEB+EVENTOS,P,0 e obtenha 60% de desconto com a Unidas para a locação de veículos.
pages-strings.O desconto é aplicado sobre os valores d: O desconto é aplicado sobre os valores de tarifa balcão disponíveis.
pages-strings.Making the Agile Brazil Program is a jou: Making the Agile Brazil Program is a journey that starts the day after the previous Agile Brazil and ends about a month after the event happens. It's a long road and many community volunteers are involved in it.
pages-strings.Who are we and what do we do?|no descrip: Who are we and what do we do?
pages-strings.Responsible for coordinating and facilit: Responsible for coordinating and facilitating activities and interacting with other organizers.
pages-strings.In pairs, they consider the revisions of: In pairs, they consider the revisions of the proposals and decide what will be approved.
pages-strings.They define the Program format: tracks,: They define the Program format: tracks, session types, guests, keynotes and rules.
pages-strings.They read submitted session proposals an: They read submitted session proposals and give feedback to authors and trail coordinators.
pages-strings.People who made up the Program committee: People who made up the Program committee the previous year, reviewers who stood out and participants who showed a lot of interest in assisting in the Program of the next conference are invited to join the Program committee.
pages-strings.Every year, we raise names of people who: Every year, we raise names of people who could be keynote speakers in the current year, considering the expected audience and the presence of the stage.
pages-strings.There are 2 international keynote speake: There are 2 international keynote speakers, 1 national and 1 keynote speaker out-of-the-box - the latter to talk about non-agility related topics.
pages-strings.Starting with the internationals, who ne: Starting with the internationals, who need more advance given the long journey and busy schedules, and then departing for national and out-of-the-box keynote.
pages-strings.These are the great areas of knowledge t: These are the great areas of knowledge that we hope to have in the Agile Brazil program. Get to know the
pages-strings.Number and track titles are rediscutidos: Number and track titles are rediscutidos every year because they also serve as a way to encourage proposals of themes that the members of the committee perceive as interesting for the public.
pages-strings.These are the session formats we expect: These are the session formats we expect to see at the conference.
pages-strings.lecture, experience report, hand in hand: lecture, experience report, hand in hand are examples. Others, such as keynote and open spaces, are not submitted but will be part of the conference!
pages-strings.To facilitate the choice of sessions by: To facilitate the choice of sessions by the conference audience, authors need to rank the expected audience in levels, in addition to describing the prerequisites.
pages-strings.In 2019 we are trying something new: ins: In 2019 we are trying something new: instead of beginner, experienced and experienced,
pages-strings.we have 4 levels based on the Dreyfus sc: we have 4 levels based on the Dreyfus scale
pages-strings.Whether for financial feasibility, or to: Whether for financial feasibility, or to make room for new names to emerge, we also review them every year.
pages-strings.For example, we do not allow one speaker: For example, we do not allow one speaker to speak in more than two sessions, nor do we allow the same set of authors to repeat themselves in two sessions. Know all the
pages-strings.The definition of the dates for each act: The definition of the dates for each activity, from the opening of submission to the publication of the grid on the site.
pages-strings.The dates shown in the submission system: The dates shown in the submission system are just a few of them! There are other intermediate deadlines to ensure that everything is well underway!
pages-strings.With the trails defined, we asked in the: With the trails defined, we asked in the committee list who would like to lead some trail and the pairs are formed. Track leads:
pages-strings.do not evaluate proposals of his track,: do not evaluate proposals of his track, so he has a vote of minerva if necessary
pages-strings.can not submit to your track, to avoid c: can not submit to your track, to avoid conflict of interest
pages-strings.Whether asking the development team to d: Whether asking the development team to do it, or rolling up sleeves and coding, we ensure the system is upgraded for the current year.
pages-strings.Reviewing the list of reviewers from the: Reviewing the list of reviewers from the previous year and listing new potential reviewers from the community, we set up the mailing list and invite those people.
pages-strings.This is an activity that begins now and: This is an activity that begins now and does not stop until the end of the term, intensifying as the deadline approaches
pages-strings.To help those who submit before and thos: To help those who submit before and those who seek to improve their proposals, reviewers begin their work earlier, commenting on questions and tips on most submissions.
pages-strings.Although tracks are designed to move a c: Although tracks are designed to move a certain subject, there is a risk of having few submissions in any of them. Track leads should be aware of this and make more specific disclosures, in this case!
pages-strings.All organizers and various members of th: All organizers and various members of the community in general are encouraged to assist in the final effort to disseminate the submission deadline.
pages-strings.Each proposal then receives three indepe: Each proposal then receives three independent reviews from the reviewers, who consider each field submitted and the authors' profile.
pages-strings.With all the reviews made, track leads w: With all the reviews made, track leads work with your peers to define which sessions they want to approve, leave as a reservation or disapprove.
pages-strings.All track leads are online to check rest: All track leads are online to check restrictions and repeat subjects, then choose which sessions will be chosen, which ones will be booked and which ones will not enter.
pages-strings.When approval decisions are made, track: When approval decisions are made, track leads still add a brief own feedback on each proposal, and when they are all ready, confirmation emails are sent.
pages-strings.Chairs keep an eye on the confirmation o: Chairs keep an eye on the confirmation of the authors of the accepted sessions and notify the track leads when there is any drop-off, so they can appoint the substitute.
pages-strings.Assembly and publication of the grid|no: Assembly and publication of the grid
pages-strings.The program chairs then collaborate to s: The program chairs then collaborate to set up a grid for the event that has the most popular sessions in larger rooms and minimizing subject conflicts by time.
pages-strings.After passing the conference, the volunt: After passing the conference, the volunteers deliver the feedbacks per session to the chairs, who organize such data and take statistics about them.
pages-strings.In addition, to authors who show interes: In addition, to authors who show interest, we have sent the received green, yellow and red numbers.
pages-strings.The process of getting the videos record: The process of getting the videos recorded during the conference is long: you have to charge for the recordings, edit the uploaded videos, add a sticker and upload to
pages-strings.public library of the Agile Alliance|no: public library of the Agile Alliance
pages-strings.The entire committee then has the voice: The entire committee then has the voice to point out what needs improvement and to suggest suggestions that will be evaluated by the next chairs and program committee at the beginning of the next Agile Brazil organization!
pages-strings.There are many steps and many fallbacks: There are many steps and many fallbacks for problem cases! But we do with affection and ethics, completely voluntarily and seeking to be the most transparent process of choices of sessions we know!
